response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This remarkable item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. After careful consideration, I propose to offer this product to you at a special price of $1,350,000. This is a generous offer that reflects both the high quality of the product and its significant importance to you, valued at $1,200,000. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both our interests. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
